column2: Passenger Stairway. Services various passenger door sill heights of 134" to 223". (Aircraft such as: A300, A310, A320, A321, A330, A340, B747, B757, B767, B777, B787 MD11, MD10, L1011). Platform capacity 1000 lbs, stairway capacity 3500 lbs, folding tow bar w / 3" diameter eye. Adjustable platform height using hand pump. Battery powered LED lighting system with adjustable timer, on-board battery charger, battery level indicator, stabilizer jacks, sliding handrails, non-marring soft rubber bumpers. Electric Power Lift for 2820, 2830 & 2850 Passenger Stairways. Includes hydraulic pump and motor, 12V DC battery, charger & backup hand pump.

Passenger Stairway. Services various passenger door sill heights of 88" to 161" (Aircraft: ERJ170/190, DC-9/MD80-90, B727, B737, A318/319/ 320/321, B757). Extra-large 6x4 foot platform with 1000 lbs capacity, stairway capacity 3500 lbs, Folding tow bar w / 3" diameter eye. Adjustable platform height using hand pump. Battery powered LED lighting system with adjustable timer, on-board battery charger, battery level indicator, stabilizer jacks, sliding handrails, non-marring soft rubber bumpers. Electric Power Lift for 2820, 2830 & 2850 Passenger Stairways. Includes hydraulic pump and motor, 12V DC battery, charger & backup hand pump.

Lav Cart. Features a patented, 3-gallon batching system to eliminate inadvertent overfilling of aircraft lav system. Ideally sized for corporate lav systems, this unit eliminates costly operator and meter failures. Suitable to service corporate & small regional aircraft. CAPACITY: 35-gallon waste, 28-gallon fill-flush and 3-gallon batch tank (corrosion proof rotationally molded polyethylene construction). Two 12-volt electric pumps, 14.5 gpm @ 40 psi and 16 gpm @50 psi with onboard battery and charging system.
Compact 400 HZ GPU with excellent maintenance accessibility
115/200 VAC, 3 PH, 4 wire wye, grounded neutral, brushless generator
TLD electronic Generator Control Module (GCM2) with data logging system
Rugged fifth wheel with towbar actuated parking brake
Side-mounted cable bin with integral rollers
Forklift pockets and tie down rings
TLD Livery - TLD White & Grey Panels

column3: Cable Assembly, External Electric Power, 115/200 Volt, 400Hertz, 2/0 size,               - 40 FT (12M)
Cable Assembly, External Electric Power, 28 Volt DC, 4/0 size, - 50 FT (15M)

column1: Interested vendors are requested to provide the following:

1. Vendor's name, CAGE and SAM UEI, and Business Size (Large or Small) for NAICS 336413 IAW an active sam.gov profile, Reps & Certs (FAR / DFARS), FAR 52.219-1. Provide any SBA socioeconomic certifications IAW SBA Dynamic Small Business Search (DSBS) profile.
2.  A statement of the items vendor can provide. Ex. Vendor can provide all items or only xxx.
3.  A maximum of three product descriptions / capability statements of items that meet the specifications including pricing for each item.

THIS IS A SOURCES SOUGHT NOTICE (SSN)  NOTICE ONLY - This SSN is issued solely for information and market research purposes. It does not constitute a Request for Proposal (RFP) or a promise to issue an RFP in the future. Solicitations are not available at this time. Requests for a solicitation will not receive a response. This notice does not constitute a commitment by the United States Government to contract for any supply or service whatsoever.

All information submitted in response to this announcement is voluntary; the United States Government will not pay for information requested nor will it compensate any respondent for any cost incurred in developing information provided to the United States Government. Not responding to this RFI does not preclude participation in any future RFP, if any is issued. Respondents shall not be obligated to provide the services described herein. If a solicitation is released, it will be synopsized on https://usg01.safelinks.protection.office365.us/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsam.gov%2F&data=05%7C02%7Cheather.m.allen58.civ%40army.mil%7C8cff0d78840346e1c3d608dda527b1cb%7Cfae6d70f954b481192b60530d6f84c43%7C0%7C0%7C638848312077584262%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=gnzFA2QCwgQoKusIb9TyQlouwT9%2BzdlOpapYF%2F%2BCpoU%3D&reserved=0.
